text: "I Know Where It's At" is a 1997 debut single by the band All Saints. It was taken from their debut self-titled studio album. It went to number 4 in the United Kingdom, number 8 in New Zealand, number 7 in Canada, number 12 in Australia, number 16 in Israel and number 19 in Ireland. == References == Category:1997 songs Category:Debut singles Category:All Saints (group) songs Category:Pop songs Category:Hip hop soul songs Category:R&B; songs
title: I Know Where It's At
